title: Diamond 3 top/mid main looking for plat/diamond team

replies.body:
You can join my discord community :3 so far theres just bronze-plat, no diamond players yet, but i hope to recruit some. People for ranked, normals, ip boost, everything, and i hope to make teams for scrims and eventually RP prizes. Just message the owner with main role/rank when you get there to be tagges as everyones organized by main role with an elo tag attached. 
https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFplGPy7D just paste this in your browser if you dont have the app downloaded. Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
